name: Content Quality & Relevance
insights: Strong topical authority in AI/ML domain
High semantic relevance to target queries

issues.title: Outdated statistics in 3 articles
issues.description: Articles reference 2022 data that should be updated to 2024

recommendations: Update statistical references to 2024 data sources
Add more case studies and real-world examples
Implement schema.org markup for technical content
Expand content on emerging AI search trends

name: Trust & EEAT Signals
insights: Strong author credentials on technical content

issues.title: Missing author bios on 45% of articles
issues.description: Many blog posts lack clear author attribution and credentials

issues.title: Limited third-party validation
issues.description: Few external reviews or testimonials visible to AI crawlers

recommendations: Add comprehensive author bios with credentials to all content
Implement structured author markup (schema.org/Person)
Encourage customers to leave reviews on major platforms
Build more backlinks from .edu and .gov domains

name: AI Citability Score
insights: Good citation rate in technical queries
Referenced in 12% of relevant AI responses

issues.title: Low citation in conversational queries
issues.description: Brand rarely cited when users ask natural language questions

issues.title: Competing sources outrank you in 68% of queries
issues.description: Competitors are cited more frequently by AI models

recommendations: Optimize content for natural language question patterns
Create FAQ sections addressing common user queries
Improve content structure with clear, citation-friendly formats
Build more authoritative backlinks from AI-trusted sources

name: Non-Branded Keyword Coverage
insights: Good coverage in niche technical terms

issues.title: Weak presence in high-volume queries
issues.description: Missing from top 50 results for 12 key industry terms

issues.title: Limited coverage of adjacent topics
issues.description: Missing opportunities in related problem spaces

recommendations: Expand content to cover adjacent use cases
Target high-volume informational queries
Create pillar pages for core topics
Build topical authority through content clusters

name: Entity Relationships
insights: Well-defined brand entity in knowledge graphs
Strong associations with key industry terms
recommendations: Pursue partnerships and co-marketing opportunities
Get featured in industry comparison articles
Participate in joint webinars and events
Build relationships with thought leaders

name: Technical SEO Foundation
insights: Excellent site speed (Core Web Vitals pass)
recommendations: Fix canonical tag conflicts
Implement international hreflang if expanding globally
Consider implementing AMP for news content

name: Brand Sentiment Analysis

issues.title: Limited response to negative feedback
issues.description: Several unaddressed negative reviews on G2

recommendations: Implement systematic review response process
Address concerns raised in negative feedback
Showcase customer success stories more prominently
Monitor and respond to social media mentions
